title: Minecraft 基岩版 1.13.0 发布
author: zyjking
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zyjking 于 2019-10-31 10:09 编辑 

Minecraft 基岩版是指包括Minecraft 手机版（Android、IOS）、Win10版（VR）、主机版（XboxOne、NS）在内，使用“基岩引擎”（C++语言）开发的Minecraft统一版本。
正式版是Minecraft 基岩版经过一段时间的测试版测试之后得到的稳定版本，也是众多材质、Addon和官方领域服会逐渐跟进的版本。与此同时Google Play、Win10 Store等官方软件商店也会推送此次更新。
原文链接：https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360035247792

New Features:新特性：
Foxes!狐狸
Keep your chickens safe and your belongings close, otherwise you’ll find them dead or gone - especially come nightfall. Foxes are more active at night and seek shade to sleep during the day. However, if you’re patient enough to feed two of them Sweet Berries, you can end up with a trusty one!请看好你的鸡并且妥善保管好你的东西，否则你会发现全都不见了——尤其到了晚上的时候。狐狸在晚上出没，白天找地方睡觉。但如果你耐心地喂它们两个甜浆果给它们好处，就可以信任它们了！

Brown Mooshroom棕色哞菇
Transforms whenever a red Mooshroom is struck by lightning红色哞菇被雷劈后的产物Feed them flowers and use a bowl to harvest Suspicious Stew!喂食花朵即可用碗收集迷之炖菜！

Suspicious Stew迷之炖菜
Craft stew with different flowers to grant different potion effects for a short period of time用不同的花制作可以变换不同的药水效果Share the suspiciousness with your friends and see how they like Suspicious Stew!迷之分享给你的朋友，看他们有多喜欢！

Wither Rose凋零玫瑰
A new, scary looking flower that is planted wherever a living entity dies to the Wither一种可怕的新花朵，在生物被凋灵干掉的地方生长Might be useful when crafting Suspicious Stew?可能对制作迷之炖菜有一点帮助？

Item Frames can now be placed on the floor and ceiling!可以在顶部和底部放置物品展示框了！

Added abandoned villages加入僵尸村庄

Added a celebration event that occurs if Pillagers successfully raid a village加入了掠夺者成功袭击村庄后发生的庆祝事件

New Note Block instruments加入新的音符盒音效
Make some sweet new jams by placing certain blocks under Note Blocks!把特定方块放在音符盒底下！Discover the new instruments with Glowstone, Haybale, Block of Emerald, Pumpkin, Soul Sand, Block of Iron, Bone Block, Wool, Packed Ice, Clay, and Block of Gold试试萤石，干草块，绿宝石块，南瓜，灵魂沙，铁块，骨块，羊毛，浮冰，黏土和金块，看看音效如何？

Added five dead coral types加入了五种失活珊瑚

Added the Light Block for mapmakers为地图作者加入了光源方块
Supports auxiliary data from 0 to 15 for light level等级参数为0-15Light blocks are supported via /give, /fill, and /setblock支持使用/give，/fill，/setblock指令取得或放置The invisible End Rod (variant 6) is now automatically updated to the new Light Block隐形的末地烛（变种6）可以被光源方块自动更新

Added new in-game chat settings to improve accessibility加入新的游戏内聊天设置以改善辅助功能

Added game credits加入游戏分数
A way to see all the lovely people that work on the game!一种查看人们在游戏里做了什么好东西的方法！The credits can be viewed after defeating the Ender Dragon, and also through a new button found in the Settings menu打败末影龙后即可查看，或在设置中找到新按钮以查看

Character Creator:角色创造器Personalize your character in a number of ways, including body size and shape, limb replacement and tweaking of eyes, mouth, hairstyles and colors, facial hair, and skin tones定制你人物形象的一种方法，可以定制包括头部，身体大小，形状，或者替换四肢、眼睛大小、嘴巴、发型和颜色、胡子以及肤色。More than 100 items will be available for free. There will also be a range of custom accessories, created by the Minecraft team, available for purchase试衣间包含了超过100中免费样式任你选 。同样，Minecraft团队还制作了一些需要付费的样式内容。Traditional custom skins can still be imported as before, on Windows 10 and mobile, using the following steps: Profile > Edit Character > Classic Skins tab > Owned > Import > Choose New Skin以前的皮肤依然可以进行导入，支持Win10和手机，在个人资料→编辑角色→经典皮肤菜单栏→已拥有→导入→选择新皮肤For even more details, check out the Character Creator FAQ更多信息，请参考Character Creator FAQ

Experimental Gameplay:实验性玩法：(Work in progress features that are only available when Experimental Gameplay is enabled in world settings)（仅在世界选项中开启实验性特性开关时可用）New and improved Structure Blocks增加并改进结构方块
Structure Blocks give creators the ability to copy and save out sections of their world into structures. Saved structures can then be pasted back into the world可以让作者复制和保存一部分区块，然后粘贴到不同的地方To get a Structure Block, you must use the ‘/give’ command使用/give命令获得When a structure is being loaded in, it can also be mirrored or rotated可以将其保存的东西镜像翻转或者旋转Structure Void blocks can be placed in an area to not copy air into the target area结构空位方块在选定区域放置时不会再复制空气了See How to Play in the game for more details and tips!请在游戏中阅读更多详细信息！

For Map Makers and Add-On Creators:给地图和附加包制作者：Updated templates for 1.13.0 with new resources, behaviors, documentation, and example packs can be downloaded from aka.ms/MinecraftAddons升级模板文件至1.13.0版本，内含新的材质，行为包和文档，请至aka.ms/MinecraftAddons下载

New Data-Driven Objects for Add-Ons新的数据驱动对象和Add-Ons
Brewing stand potion recipes are now data-driven酿造台的药水配方现在属于数据驱动Arrow shake animation (MCPE-40744)箭头射中后的摇摆动画现在属于数据驱动Item breaking particles破坏物品产生的例子现在属于数据驱动Data-driven environment damage for entities实体产生的环境破坏现在属于数据驱动Added 'push' component that determines whether an entity can be pushed加入“push”组件以确定实体是否被推动Added 'persistent' component that determines whether an entity should be persistent in the game world加入“persistent”组件以确定实体是否应该保持持久Turtle Lightning interactions are now data-driven海龟被雷劈的交互事件现在属于数据驱动Pufferfish puffed states are now data-driven河豚膨胀的状态现在属于数据驱动Guardian/Elder Guardian animation and rendering对于守卫者/远古守卫者数据驱动的动画和渲染
Fixed unparented geometry on pre-1.8 guardians修复了1.8之前守卫者形状非父级的问题Elder Guardian spike animation远古守卫者攻击动画现在属于数据驱动
Fishing hook将钓鱼鱼钩动画转换为数据驱动Horse models and animations马的模型/动画现在属于数据驱动Snow Golem trail behavior雪傀儡移动并产雪的行为现在属于数据驱动Dragon Breath particles龙息粒子现在属于数据驱动Sparkler particles (Education)烟花粒子现在属于数据驱动（教育版）Balloons (Education)气球摆动动画现在属于数据驱动（教育版）

Script Engine脚本引擎
Actor Definition Events can now be triggered from scripts脚本现在可以触发并参与已被定义的事件Scripting logs can now be opened and viewed while the game is running在游玩的时候可以打开并查看脚本日志Added new scripting Actor tags添加新的角色标签Added 'container' scripting component for blocks为方块添加“container”脚本组件Added 'projectile_hit' scripting event新增“projectile_hit”脚本事件Added 'entity_hurt' scripting event新增“entity_hurt”脚本事件Added 'entity_sneak' scripting event新增“entity_sneak”脚本事件Added 'entity_attack' scripting event新增“entity_attack”脚本事件Added 'block_exploded' scripting event新增“block_exploded'”脚本事件
Added new feature rules data that implements existing biome decoration through JSON加入新的数据规则特性，可以通过JSON实现现对于生物群落的装饰
Final infrastructure changes required to support fully data-driven features. Rules themselves must be provided in a behavior pack with Experimental Gameplay enabled所有的基础更改需要数据驱动的完全支持。完全支持需要提供行为包以及开启实验性玩法。
Significantly increased the maximum 'spawnRadius' distance大幅提高“spawnRadius”的最大上限Levers now have their own block state拉杆现在拥有自己的方块属性了Changed Breathable, RideTick, and Transformation systems to use ViewedEntityContext更改Breathable，RideTick和Transformation systems以使用viewedEntityContextAll pillar blocks now have their own block state instead of using some values of the direction block state. This allows mirror and rotating with structure blocks所有竖纹方块现在都有自己的方块属性，方块会利用一些值决定方块朝向状态。这可以和结构方块一起设置镜像反转和旋转朝向。

Changes to Pack Manifests修改了包的实现形式
Summary概括
As of 1.13, we have made some changes to the pack manifest with a new format version of "2". We recommend that any new packs or world templates that you create use format version of 2 from now on. With this new format, there are a few additional changes to be aware of, detailed below自1.13开始，我们修改了包的实现形式并将版本格式修改为“2”。自现在开始，我们推荐所有创建包或世界模板的版本格式为“2”。同时有一些小细节是需要注意的，请见下文。




All Pack Types所有包的格式
The 'name' field in the header is now required for all pieces of content所有内容的开头都应该有名字注明范围。


World Templates世界模板
The 'lock_template_options' field is now required. This Boolean field determines whether the world options for your template should be locked to default values when a player creates a world from the template. They can still choose to unlock and modify the options, but will be warned that doing so could affect gameplay“lock_template_options”字段现在是必需的。这个布尔值注明了当玩家使用模板创建世界时，世界选项是否锁定为默认值。但玩家仍然可以选择解锁和修改设置，同时也会弹出警告注明会影响游戏玩法。The 'base_game_version' field is required (see below for more info)“base_game_version”字段现在是必需的（参见下方）The 'min_engine_version' field should no longer be used as it isn't parsed on world templates and produces a warning on import最好不使用“min_engine_version”字段，因为它不会生效，并且在导入时还会发出警告。



Resource and Behavior Packs材质和行为包
The 'min_engine_version' field is now required. This affects how the game interprets some of the assets loaded from Resource and Behavior Packs. We recommend using the latest available version of the game for this field (e.g. '[1, 13, 0]') to ensure your pack works correctly“min_engine_version”字段现在是必需的。这会告诉游戏应该加载材质包或行为包中的哪些资源。为了确保包能正常工作，我们推荐将此字段设置成最新的游戏版本（比如[1, 13, 0]）。



Base Game Version Field基本游戏版本字段
For this field, we recommend using the value "*". This will ensure that anyone using your content in their Minecraft worlds will always get the latest base game (Vanilla) content when an update is available.针对这个字段，我们推荐使用“*”这个值。这会确保在更新可用的时候，人人将你的内容用在他们的Minecraft世界中时，都可取得最新的原版游戏（vanilla）内容。In the case that your content relies on specific base game behavior, you can use this field to specify a base game version, starting with 1.13. If you choose to do this, you should omit the third octet; for example, if the version of the game you are targeting is '[1, 14, 2]', you would specify a version of '[1, 14, 0]'). If you specify a version this way, any worlds using your custom content will not get new base game content when it becomes available in future releases, which could help prevent unwanted changes to behavior in your content caused by updates to the base game. However, we still recommend using the "*" value to ensure players can continue to enjoy your content in their Minecraft worlds long-term while also receiving updates to the base game从1.13开始，如果你的内容需要特殊基本游戏行为的支持，你可以使用这个字段来确定基本游戏版本。如果你选择这样做，你应该忽略不使用第三个数字（第八位）; 举个例子，假如你要把你的游戏版本定为“[1, 14, 2]”，那你应该将版本定为“[1, 14, 0]”。倘若你采用此方式，那么，只要那个世界使用了你的自定义内容，将来游戏出新版本后世界都不会获取新版本的游戏内容，这可以避免因为升级游戏版本而带来的“行为被意外更改”事件的发生。然而，我们依然推荐使用“*”这个值来确保玩家可以获取基本游戏更新的同时，还可以继续在他们的Minecraft世界中畅玩你的内容。

Fixed an issue that could cause the home screen to show black corrupted textures after resuming the game on Android (MCPE-39031)The player model is now visible again while sleeping on a bedBoat paddling animation now matches Java Edition and resynchronizes when paddling stopsFixed an issue with water not rendering correctly on some servers (MCPE-46813)Fix an issue that caused block entities (such as beds) to not render after suspending and resuming the gameArrows now render correctly when held by Armor StandsArmor Stands and players can again wear helmets with secondary layersFixed Elytra position for skins that don’t use the standard humanoid modelFixed some graphical errors when launching the game on Oculus RiftFlowers no longer become invisible in flower pots (MCPE-40806)Players no longer show the flying animation when using scaffolding while Elytra are equippedImproved the texture for the stonecutter with non-fancy graphics (MCPE-42487)Tweaked first-person hand attack animationsMultiple blocks no longer change color to black when moved by pistonsTweaked the position of the shield when held in the off-hand to fix a minor texture clipping issueFixed hand animation when switching to empty hand from held item

User Interface
Accessibility color and contrast fixes and tweaks for dropdowns, buttons and the Play screenThe Text to Speech narrator now works correctly with punctuation in text boxesPlayers using touch screens can no longer break blocks when using touch-and-hold to use a fishing rodChat instructions no longer appear on screen every time the player travels through a portal (MCPE-45073)Removed duplicate and overlapping progress barsFixed the safe screen area prompt not appearing, when necessary, on certain devicesKeyboard inputs now work correctly when the game loads out of window focusFixed the "Open Chat" message for touch screen devicesFlight controls will no longer show when sleeping in a bed in creative (MCPE-44928)Fixed the inventory screens of some blocks not appearing on the first attempt after the block's state has changed, like Hoppers and DispensersThe wither's health bar no longer disappears during the fight if the player moves away (MCPE-40881)Using 'Place All' (Y) on the Cartography Table output slot now only crafts as many of the shown result possibleJoining a Realm through the 'Joinable Friends' list no longer shows world info (MCPE-47731)The background tint of the player coordinates is now consistent with the chat background (MCPE-43791)Tweaked the controller cursor position when auto-crafting with a full inventoryObfuscated text once again works with the smooth font chat settingFixed duplicated 'Sign In' messages that were overlappingThe correct Marketplace Inventory items are now shown when switching between playersGlobal resource packs in Settings will now update to the new chosen languageUpdated the How to Play section so that it specifies that carved pumpkins should be used as protection from EndermenUpdated the How to Play section about repairing Elytra, which now describes using Phantom Membranes to repair them instead of leather (MCPE-41608)Updated the How to Play section regarding RaidsUpdated the How to Play section regarding Host and Player Options (MCPE-28976)Updated the How to Play section about taming cats (MCPE-43490)

Commands
Execute detect command now uses local coordinates correctly (MCPE-29942)
Modified 'CommandPosition' so that an optional offset can be specified to move the rotation point in case of a local coordinateFixed the 'ExecuteCommand' detect option to correctly use an entity rather than a position so that it can use the entity orientation to calculate camera relative offsets
Using '/spreadplayers' no longer permanently loads distant chunksPowered rails placed using '/fill' now work correctly when powered by RedstoneUsing '/setblock' on a piston base no longer leaves an invisible piston armCloned active mob spawners now have an animated mob when placed (MCPE-23106)The '/clear' command once again works correctly with damageable itemsRunning the "/clear" command message now shows correct amount of items removed (MCPE-34750)Carpet is now removed correctly when using the '/clear' commandUsing '/clear @p item' now clears correctly auxiliary valuesPistons with data values 6 and 7 can no longer be placed using slash commands (MCPE-21558)Players can no longer use the '/spawnpoint' command in the NetherUsing the command '@s[type=...]' will now work correctly (MCPE-49766)Fixed an error message that occurred when using the '/help' command
